denver.embeddings¶

denver.embeddings.embeddings¶

class denver.embeddings.embeddings.Embeddings(embedding_types='pooled_flair_embeddings', pretrain=None, pooling='min')[source]¶

Bases: object

A Embedding class.

embed()[source]¶

Function embedding

Returns

embedding: A Embedding as a class embeddings in flair.

fine_tuning(corpus_dir='./data/corpus', model_dir='./models', dictionary=None, is_forward_lm=True, hidden_size=1024, nlayers=1, embedding_size=100, dropout=0.1, sequence_length=250, batch_size=32, learning_rate=20, max_epoch=500, patience=10, checkpoint=False)[source]¶
Parameters

  • corpus_dir (Union[str, Path]) – Path to corpus folder. the architecture of folder is: corpus/ corpus/train/ corpus/train/train_split_1 corpus/train/train_split_2 corpus/train/… corpus/train/train_split_X corpus/test.txt corpus/valid.txt

  • model_dir (Union[str, Path]) – The folder to save checkpoint

  • dictionary (Union[str, Path, None]) – The name or path to the use dictionary

  • is_forward_lm (bool) – If True, use the language model forward

  • hidden_size (int) – The number of hidden states in RNN, use when fine-tune without pretrain

  • rnn_layers – The number of RNN layers, use when fine-tune without pretrain

  • embedding_size (int) – The size of embedding, use when fine-tune without pretrain

  • dropout (float) – dropout probability, use when fine-tune without pretrain

  • sequence_length (int) – Max sequence length

  • batch_size (int) – Batch size

  • learning_rate (float) – Learning rate (default=20)

  • max_epoch (int) – Max epoch (default=20)

  • patience (int) – Patience is the number of epochs with no improvement the Trainer waits until annealing the learning rate

  • checkpoint (bool) – If True, save checkpoint each epoch when training.

Returns

embedding: A Embedding as a class embeddings in flair.
